Cassini js library API - v0.0.1

Cassini

This is the official documentation of Cassini for JavaScript and TypeScript. Cassini is a FEM code which allows to perform structural restoration using geomechanics. It is mainly based on the publication L. Maerten, F. Maerten, 2006, Chronologic modeling of faulted and fractured reservoirs using geomechanically based restoration: Technique and industry applications, AAPG Bulletin

Cassini can be run either from the frontend (web browser) or in the backend (using node.js or Python).
